comment: "va" is pronounced as "o" in social contexts; "ast" is usually pronounced as "e"

the more natural way to say it would be without “balke”
the more natural way to say it would be without “balke”

grammatical but not great in this context; it means that she is neither...; “na” … “na” - sentence strongly preferred
